txt.en: 'My brother Calengil is staying at Duillond, our refuge to the north. Like me, he also strives to restore the old places to their pristine state and may need your help.\n\n'Follow the road to the high ground above Celondim, then make your way north through a gap in the hills to reach the refuge.'

'So, Thinglaer has succeeded in driving the darkness back from Tham Gelair with your aid? I too have such a task before me -- but, alas, I have no trinket from Rivendell to aid me.\n\n'I do know much of the herbs of these lands however and can mix a draught that should serve to purify the nearby ruins -- will you lend me your aid in this endeavour?'
'My brother Calengil resides in Duillond to the north. He could use your aid with his own tasks, I believe.'
Thinglaer's brother Calengil also seeks to restore the ancient Elf-ruins within Ered Luin and requires your aid.
Calengil can be found in the Elf-refuge of Duillond to the north.\n\nThinglaer has asked you to seek out his brother Calengil and lend him what aid you may.
